name: Burnout (itch)
description:
Burnout is an introspective game about a game developer haunted by his work, for whom home is the only place where he can achieve peace. Alternate between upbeat, peaceful exploration and disturbing, anxiety-driven stealth in a 2D isometric GBA-looking game !

- Event : GGJ 2019

- Theme : What home means to you

- Duration : 48h

Burnout is the work of :

  • Lucas FRICHE : Sound, Music, Narration
  • Florian ORTEGA : Graphics
  • Benjamin PELTIER : Game Design, Level Design, Programmation
  • Florentin PETERS : Game Design, Level Design, Additional Graphics (Night versions of most sprites)
  • Chris WARIN : Programmation
